reviews.review:
I've had this game in my list for a few years, just got round to playing it.

I loved Bioshock 1 and 2, the disfunctional underwater scene made sense, an idealic society that turned to madness. They were atmospheric and full of suspense as you explored that ruined world.

Infinite , I didn't like.. It was a bright functioning society and to be honest I felt like an asshole going around shooting people, didn't gel with or care about Booker one bit.

Controls were spongy (try running while strafing) , story didn't grip me and I just didn't feel like I wanted to succeed.

The SJW BS didn't help either, white conservative people = bad.

I lasted about 6 hours before uninstalling.. No real enjoyment, just felt like grinding. such a dissapointment from the first 2 games, avoid unless you're some fat purple haried weirdo who wants to see a functioning society be destroyed.
 2/10... trash game which killed the franchise.
4k优化不太行啊，2k臭弟弟

不知道是不是win10缘故，经常玩半个小时就卡死，生化奇兵前两部都没这么严重
刚开始游戏那画面就把我震撼到了，居然还有个这么有用的小女孩跟着，爱了爱了
有个DLC控制伊丽莎白，又变成另一个游戏了，可以完全潜入了（困难难度不潜入打不过），而且还完美的把1代联系在一起，这DLC玩到中途我就看到切脑前叶的广告牌，我就在想会不会遇到切脑前叶画面，还真有，看得我痛死了（所以提醒各位剧情该跳过就跳过，有些东西不是你想看到的）。但是仔细想想，这个DLC真的好，居然能在1代之前的故事这么衍生
电子游戏的艺术
Muy buen juego, no hace falta haber jugado a los anteriores pero te ayudaran a disfrutar el final.

进到天空之城，看着巨大的游行车驶过，妻子抱着怀里的婴儿被称之为Son of the City，让我想起看启示录时，二战期间军官坐在战车上游行广场的景象，此刻我非常能体会上世纪五六十年代所说的美国梦是种什么感觉，还有商店里匾牌写着的You Are Your Honor，真的是非常American dream. 当初美国的辉煌可窥一斑。
非常精细和富含文化底蕴的设计，可以让人抛开剧情一一细品。
echt kreative Story, sehr geil!

射击手感一般，结合魔法设定战斗莫名像耻辱。剧情神作，核心诡计到中盘才逐渐揭开，结尾直接爆炸。（有点石头门的既视感）伊丽莎白全程陪伴的设定，简直是死宅福音。

I was so stoked to buy Infinite for STeam Sale but 
it's already in my Library. 
Hail Comstock!

Um dos melhores jogos da carreira de Ken Levine e, infelizmente, o canto do cisne da Irrational Games, desenvolvedora que nos deu System Shock. As reviravoltas da trama, ambientação de Columbia e a viagem do protagonista fazem de Infinite um dos melhores jogos da sétima geração de consoles. O roteiro leva o jogador a um desfecho cheio de referências, prato cheio pros entendidos em semiótica, qualquer comentário sobre seria spoiler. Gameplay tenso, gráficos lindos e som fora do comum, vale cada centavo, cada minuto jogado.

this game is one of the tops best story tell, game play is incredible good, but jezz the only thing you will hate about this game is the ending its a kick in the balls, which it will make you want to go to the developers of the game and start punching them for making such ending, but even that you will also love the ending because of what it is, if you want to know why you must play this game do not cheat and watch a YouTube video, the first time you need to play it with no spoilers and you will fall in love with this game, another good thing about this game is that its so good that you could play the main story a bunch of times and you will still love it and hated your self for watching the ending again lmao, this is my 3th time playing and completing this game in console and pc and even this is my 3th time i still cry and hate my self for watching it again lol.

Honestly, this is a great game that I will always love to play. Even years after it's release, the game holds up well. That said, the game shoots itself in the foot in a few different ways. This is an FPS shooter with a story, if you want to shoot your way to victory then this is the game for you. Clash in the Clouds add on is kinda fun in a do what you want sort of way, but it can be more frustrating than fun at times. For anyone who completes Clash in the Clouds, the puddle will only leave you disappointed. The other storyline is fun, but don't expect it to feel like the original or 2. 2K really should have given Infinite a different name because this game is far from it. If you are new to PC games and want to start with something fun, familiar, and interesting then this is a great game. I personally love showing this game to people who are coming from a console. 9/10 and I don't regret the buy one bit, that said I did get it on sale (would not recommend paying full price just because of its age)

Bioshock Infinite cierra la saga de la mejor forma posible, es más si incluimos los DLCs ni falta nos hace un nuevo Bioshock. 
La historia es una de las más complejas y sorprendente que salió del estudio, toda una trama de Grietas espaciotemporales, ciudades flotantes y una deuda que saldar.
Visualmente el juego es increíble, pensar el año de salida y compararlo con un juego actual da mucho de qué hablar sobre cuando se quieren hacer las cosas bien. Artísticamente mantiene todo lo que hizo especial a Bioshock y su estética “art-deco” por una más feria americana.
Sonoramente el juego es una gozada, cada pieza esta para ponersela a escuchar una y otra vez.
Un juego que recomiendo seas o no fan de la saga, aunque eso sí es altamente recomendable al menos conocer el “lore” del 1 porque es una entrega numerada prácticamente, a su vez laza muchos cabos que en los juegos siempre quedan dudas.
nice

Escrever uma análise de BioShock Infinite
Descreva o que gostou e o que não gostou neste jogo e se você o recomenda a outros.
Não se esqueça de ser bem-educado e seguir as regras e diretrizes.
Me fui cortao. Jueguense los 3 antes de morir o no valdrá la pena haber nacido.

6/10
 The story is by far the best part of this game but is still not quite as good as the storytelling in Bioshock 1 and the writing can be a bit spotty at times. The gameplay is rather enjoyable although a bit repetitive towards the end and the finale wraps things up well with the last big action set piece of the game being a stand out moment although slightly ruined by some poor controls for a new mechanic.
Overall i would recommend getting this game if you like or having an interest in the Bioshock series although if you have some doubts or are strapped for cash i would wait until a sale.
Muy buen juego y entretenido 10/10
говно собаки 0/0
game

Sou bastante fã da franquia de Bioshock e quando vi as fotos do jogo achei que fugiria um pouco do padrão. Porém, me surpreendi muito positivamente, foi um dos poucos jogos nestes últimos tempos que passei o dia inteiro jogando preso na história e ansioso para zerá-lo. Além disso, o jogo é muito leve e possui gráficos lindos! Sem dúvidas, mais do que recomendo este game espetacular!
Затягивает сюжет

Bioshock: Infinite is probably my favorite of the Bioshock trilogy.  The setting of Columbia is an exciting and breathtaking one.  The story, characters and game play all work.  I found myself not able to put this one down when.  What was great was this game transformed the bioshock franchise from what it was to an anthology series with each new installment going forward (presumably) telling a new story unhindered by the continuity of the "rapture" games.  While I normally dont like "escort missions" in games but I fell hard for Elizabeth <3 The games plot was an emotional rollercoaster that really knew how to tug at the heart strings (hence i cant say much about it without ruining/spoiling it lol) while i loved this game i did have some gripes.  The lack of a final boss really hurt the game as it made the game feel incomplete despite a well crafted ending.  My biggest single complaint though was Burial at Sea Episode 2.  Everything about this dlc pack was wrong.  from needless tie ins to rapture, retconns of the games main story, to retreading old ground. not to mentioned the name "episode 2" implies there was supposed to be more dlc that never came to fruition so this was a failed attempt episodic gaming avoid the dlc like the plague.  if you have to play burial at sea episode 1 (it doesnt add anything  but doesnt detract either, and i think theres some multiplayer maps and guns worth while at least) DO NOT PLAY episode 2 it ruins the end of the main game that was so great

An epic game. I took a long time to finish because I stopped and begin many times. It has a fantastic and deep story, and the action is frenetic, with many skills and weapons to use. There're many places to explore. 9/10

Nada mejor que tener la oportunidad de volver a jugar uno de los mejores juegos de ps3 con una historia interesante y buena jugabilidad,ademas de la evidente mejora grafica el ver una columbia con graficos relativamente nuevos enamora con su apartado artistico igualmente como lo lograba en 2012 un 10/10 y una buena compra en especial si adquieres el pack de bioshock collection

Bioshock Infinite feels like a re-imagining of the Bioshock series, changing the combat, the setting, the tone, the structure, and . . . well, just about everything, except for hints and nods towards the original series.
With that said, the game is still excellent and succeeds in its own way, even if it does feel a bit more like an overly polished first-person shooter

Игра великолепна. Прежде всего хочется отметить волшебный воздушный город, который с первого взгляда кажется раем. Воздушный город красив внешне, но ужасен внутренне: различные бандитские группировки, мародёры и ужасный верховный диктатор - со всеми ими нам нужно сражаться. Линейное прохождение и отсутствие полностью открытого мира совсем не мешает погрузиться в атмосферу игры. Графика слегка мультяшна, но от этого она не мешает игровому процессу и прекрасно дополняет атмосферу. Геймплей разнообразный и затягивающий. Сюжет - вообще отдельная тема. Можно по пальцам пересчитать людей, которые полностью поняли весь сюжет и всю задумку игры.
梦境一般的游戏，行云流水，很好玩

To put it simply, the Bioshock trilogy is nothing short of a masterpiece. It is an experience that you will never forget, a must for any FPS fan.

游戏是好游戏，就是剧情让人有些难以理解。对我而言，看完分析以后还是有不理解的地方[spoiler]淹死布克真的有意义吗，你那个世界康姆斯托克已经被干死了，同归于尽也太亏 了，伊丽莎白消失，布克淹死就是主角二人想要的？理解不能[/spoiler]
突突突部分没有什么特别出彩的，但也不拉胯。真正优秀的还是美术风格，剧情氛围，世界气氛带给人的体验

Este juego es una verdadera obra maestra. No sólo la historia es excelente y probablemente una de las mejores historias en un videojuego, sino que la atención al detalle en cada rincón hacen que te sientas completamente inmerso en Columbia...
100% recomendado y uno de los juegos obligatorios para cualquier gamer.

Even untill today, BioShock Infinite is still one of the best game I have ever played. Although there are some flaws, which for me is the little-bit-repetitive gameplay, this shooter's story, the characters, and the mindblowing visual art truly makes up for it. To anyone who craves a game with an awesome story, I could not recommend this game more.
Overall I'll give this a 9 out of 10.

Hello my good friends

The title I'm criticizing today is Mr. Ken Levine's play Bioshock, a great and legendary playwright who can well illustrate the ugliness of human actions and its dark side, and how humanity destroys salvation and morality while He wants to upgrade it and build an utopia and the right way to live. A city that will soon become a place for the lives of certain people, as they say, by showing its resources and beautiful appearance and rich people, and very soon Weak and weak people become like slaves for them to achieve their goals, and if they see oppression in this way, or they are killed, or they protest, and they are oppressed, there is nothing wrong with that. Especially those who wanted to plunder and plunder the rest so that they could live better, and soon, during the story and with the characters in the story, his ugly face will appear and be completely destroyed. And why does he take it and want to show us where we are and what we are?
You have to experience the story yourself, and I won't go into more detail.
Regarding the gameplay style of the game, I would like to say that in 2021, it will still be of high quality and next to the big shooter game. Types and types of weapons along with various powers such as electricity, tornado, fireball, etc. It has been formed and the enemies intend to stop you in different types and with terrible weapons and equipment. The upgrades of weapons and equipment, along with making electricity and tornadoes more powerful, can create dozens of combinations of different struggles, even in You don't feel tired at the end of the game. The same is true for the three versions of the BioShock game. Experience and enjoy this game and learn the art of making games in the cities of Rapture and Colombia.

But what a conundrum; and the story was very nice too, the caged bird finally get her wings to fly.  Isn't it nice to see birds in the sky?

I have *never* had this much fun playing a game, at all. While I write this after experiencing Infinite's story, I can safely say this is one of my favorite games. Hands-down. But, all in all? Story is fantastic, gameplay is great, fighting is still as fun as it was in BioShock 1, and yeah. It's fun.

je les fini il ya a peut pres 4heures (je devait attendre car j'etait en train d'exploser a cause de la fin) je les fait en environ 7h et 30 minutes (car les autres minutes c'etait avec une autre partie pour m'habituer au gameplay) sinon j'attend le 4 ;) bizou (si vous jouez pour la premiere fois je vous conseille de commencer en facile)

okay, the gameplay is... good but not as the original games. the story was really good and if you are a fan of the original games you will love the DLC, i enjoyed the DLC more than the actual game, i just was not a fan of Columbia as much as i loved the creepy and mysterious world of Rapture.

If I'm not comparing this game to the originals its a pretty interesting game, a little repetitive and easy but Elizabeth is a really cool character, the antagonists are forgettable but what i will remember is Elizabeth and our journey, and the eye opening ending, I had to watch a few videos to describe and explain what really happened but after i figured it out I was in love. 

the story was such an interesting and cool idea, I love how they connect the game to the originals.

cons: game gives you all the ammo you will ever need and never feels challenging even on the hardest difficulty. isin't scary at any point, so I didin't have any feeling of intensity or anything like the original. the area are very forgettable and not interesting

pros: its a very good looking game with some good AI. Elizabeth is a really good companion that you don't have to worry about getting killed so she doesin't feel like a burden on you. the voice acting is really good and makes the world feel alive.
艺术，剧情，关卡设计，音乐，伊丽莎白，都强的不行，买就完事了，很强，很强
